title: Arts Division to present ‘The Business of Entertainment’ panel of industry leaders (University of California, ...
text: ( Source : University of California, Santa Cruz ) How does a film or television program go from concept to production? Of course it all starts with an idea, but there are also countless behind-the-scenes deals that contribute to making it
